trans-unit.source: Add push notifications to your Xamarin.iOS app with Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Add push notifications to your Xamarin.iOS app with Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Azure App Service to send push notifications to your Xamarin.iOS app
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Azure App Service to send push notifications to your Xamarin.iOS app

trans-unit.source: Add push notifications to your Xamarin.iOS App
trans-unit.target: Add push notifications to your Xamarin.iOS App

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is based on the [Xamarin.iOS quickstart tutorial](app-service-mobile-xamarin-ios-get-started.md), which you must complete first.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is based on the [Xamarin.iOS quickstart tutorial](app-service-mobile-xamarin-ios-get-started.md), which you must complete first.

trans-unit.source: You will add push notifications to the Xamarin.iOS quick start project so that every time a record is inserted, a push notification is sent.
trans-unit.target: You will add push notifications to the Xamarin.iOS quick start project so that every time a record is inserted, a push notification is sent.

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the downloaded quick start server project, you must add the push notification extension package to your project.
trans-unit.target: If you do not use the downloaded quick start server project, you must add the push notification extension package to your project.

trans-unit.source: For more information about server extension packages, see [Work with the .NET backend server SDK for Azure Mobile Apps](app-service-mobile-dotnet-backend-how-to-use-server-sdk.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about server extension packages, see [Work with the .NET backend server SDK for Azure Mobile Apps](app-service-mobile-dotnet-backend-how-to-use-server-sdk.md).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: To complete this tutorial, you need the following:
trans-unit.target: To complete this tutorial, you need the following:

trans-unit.source: An active Azure account.
trans-unit.target: An active Azure account.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an account yet, sign up for an Azure trial and get up to 10 free Mobile App backends.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an account yet, sign up for an Azure trial and get up to 10 free Mobile App backends.

trans-unit.source: You can keep using them even after your trial ends.
trans-unit.target: You can keep using them even after your trial ends.

trans-unit.source: See [Azure Free Trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).
trans-unit.target: See [Azure Free Trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).

trans-unit.source: A Mac with [Xamarin Studio] and [Xcode] v4.4 or later installed it.
trans-unit.target: A Mac with [Xamarin Studio] and [Xcode] v4.4 or later installed it.

trans-unit.source: You can run the Xamarin.iOS app using Visual Studio on a Windows computer if you want, but it's a bit more complicated because you have to connect to a networked Mac running the Xamarin.iOS Build Host.
trans-unit.target: You can run the Xamarin.iOS app using Visual Studio on a Windows computer if you want, but it's a bit more complicated because you have to connect to a networked Mac running the Xamarin.iOS Build Host.

trans-unit.source: If you're interested in doing that, see [Installing Xamarin.iOS on Windows].
trans-unit.target: If you're interested in doing that, see [Installing Xamarin.iOS on Windows].

trans-unit.source: A physical iOS device.
trans-unit.target: A physical iOS device.

trans-unit.source: Push notifications are not supported by the iOS simulator.
trans-unit.target: Push notifications are not supported by the iOS simulator.

trans-unit.source: An [Apple Developer Program membership](https://developer.apple.com/programs/ios/), required to register with the Apple Push Notification Service (APNS).
trans-unit.target: An [Apple Developer Program membership](https://developer.apple.com/programs/ios/), required to register with the Apple Push Notification Service (APNS).

trans-unit.source: Complete the [Xamarin.iOS quickstart tutorial](app-service-mobile-xamarin-ios-get-started.md).
trans-unit.target: Complete the [Xamarin.iOS quickstart tutorial](app-service-mobile-xamarin-ios-get-started.md).

trans-unit.source: Register the app for push notifications on Apple's developer portal
trans-unit.target: Register the app for push notifications on Apple's developer portal

trans-unit.source: Configure your Mobile App to send push notifications
trans-unit.target: Configure your Mobile App to send push notifications

trans-unit.source: To configure your app to send notifications, create a new hub and configure it for the platform notification services that you will use.
trans-unit.target: To configure your app to send notifications, create a new hub and configure it for the platform notification services that you will use.

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com/), click **Browse** > **Mobile Apps** > your Mobile App > **Settings** > **Mobile** > **Push** > **Notification Hub** > **+ Notification Hub**, and provide a name and namespace for a new notification hub, and then click the **OK** button.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com/), click **Browse** > **Mobile Apps** > your Mobile App > **Settings** > **Mobile** > **Push** > **Notification Hub** > **+ Notification Hub**, and provide a name and namespace for a new notification hub, and then click the **OK** button.

trans-unit.source: In the Create Notification Hub blade, click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: In the Create Notification Hub blade, click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Push** > **Apple (APNS)** > **Upload Certificate**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Push** > **Apple (APNS)** > **Upload Certificate**.

trans-unit.source: Upload the .p12 push certificate file you exported earlier.
trans-unit.target: Upload the .p12 push certificate file you exported earlier.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to select **Sandbox** if you created a development push certificate for development and testing.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to select **Sandbox** if you created a development push certificate for development and testing.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, choose **Production**.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, choose **Production**.

trans-unit.source: Your service is now configured to work with push notifications on iOS.
trans-unit.target: Your service is now configured to work with push notifications on iOS.

trans-unit.source: Update the server project to send push notifications
trans-unit.target: Update the server project to send push notifications

trans-unit.source: Configure your Xamarin.iOS project
trans-unit.target: Configure your Xamarin.iOS project

trans-unit.source: Add push notifications to your app
trans-unit.target: Add push notifications to your app

trans-unit.source: In **QSTodoService**, add the following property so that **AppDelegate** can acquire the mobile client:
trans-unit.target: In **QSTodoService**, add the following property so that **AppDelegate** can acquire the mobile client:

trans-unit.source: Add the following `using` statement to the top of the **AppDelegate.cs** file.
trans-unit.target: Add the following `using` statement to the top of the **AppDelegate.cs** file.

trans-unit.source: In **AppDelegate**, override the **FinishedLaunching** event:
trans-unit.target: In **AppDelegate**, override the **FinishedLaunching** event:

trans-unit.source: In the same file, override the **RegisteredForRemoteNotifications** event.
trans-unit.target: In the same file, override the **RegisteredForRemoteNotifications** event.

trans-unit.source: In this code you are registering for a simple template notification that will be sent across all supported platforms by the server.
trans-unit.target: In this code you are registering for a simple template notification that will be sent across all supported platforms by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information on templates with Notification Hubs, see [Templates](../notification-hubs/notification-hubs-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on templates with Notification Hubs, see [Templates](../notification-hubs/notification-hubs-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Then, override the **DidReceivedRemoteNotification** event:
trans-unit.target: Then, override the **DidReceivedRemoteNotification** event:

trans-unit.source: Your app is now updated to support push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Your app is now updated to support push notifications.

trans-unit.source: Test push notifications in your app
trans-unit.target: Test push notifications in your app

trans-unit.source: Press the **Run** button to build the project and start the app in an iOS capable device, then click **OK** to accept push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Press the **Run** button to build the project and start the app in an iOS capable device, then click **OK** to accept push notifications.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You must explicitly accept push notifications from your app.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You must explicitly accept push notifications from your app.

trans-unit.source: This request only occurs the first time that the app runs.
trans-unit.target: This request only occurs the first time that the app runs.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type a task, and then click the plus (**+**) icon.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type a task, and then click the plus (**+**) icon.

trans-unit.source: Verify that a notification is received, then click **OK** to dismiss the notification.
trans-unit.target: Verify that a notification is received, then click **OK** to dismiss the notification.

trans-unit.source: Repeat step 2 and immediately close the app, then verify that a notification is shown.
trans-unit.target: Repeat step 2 and immediately close the app, then verify that a notification is shown.

trans-unit.source: You have successfully completed this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You have successfully completed this tutorial.
